Package task1

Class MetroStationWithSorting

java.lang.Object
task1.AbstractMetroStation
task1.MetroStationWithArray
task1.MetroStationWithSorting
public class MetroStationWithSorting extends MetroStationWithArray
Represents metro station data with an array of operating hours and overridden sorting methods. This class extends (inherits from) the MetroStationWithArray class. Also, this class is inherited from the abstract AbstractMetroStation class.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    MetroStationWithSorting()
    The constructor initialises the metro station with the default values.
    MetroStationWithSorting(String name, int opened)
    The constructor initialises the metro station with the specified values with name and opened year.
    MetroStationWithSorting(String name, int opened, Hour[] hours)
    The constructor initialises the metro station object with the specified values with name, opened year and operating hour.

  • Method Details

    • sortByDecreasingRidership

      public void sortByDecreasingRidership()
      Overridden decreasing ridership sorting method using the standard sort function of class Arrays. This method is provided by the implementation of the Comparable interface for objects of type Hour.
      Overrides:
      sortByDecreasingRidership in class AbstractMetroStation

    • sortByDescendingCommentLength

      public void sortByDescendingCommentLength()
      Overridden descending comment length sorting method using the standard sort function of class Arrays and Comparator. This method is provided by creating a separate class CommentComparator that implements the Comparator interface for objects of type Hour.
      Overrides:
      sortByDescendingCommentLength in class AbstractMetroStation

    • testMetroStationWithSorting

      public void testMetroStationWithSorting()
      Performs testing of the functionality of the MetroStationWithSorting class.
